alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 11:24AM EDT until June 16 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 1230 PM EDT/1130 AM CDT/. * At 1122 AM EDT/1022 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Donalsonville to near Blountstown to 6 miles northwest of Stonemill Creek to 7 miles south of Tyndall Air Force Base, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, Quincy, Havana, Bainbridge, Midway, Cairo, Florida State University, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Tallahassee Community College, St. Marks, Donalsonville, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach and Whigham. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
